DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase 4, multicenter, randomized, non-therapeutic interventional trial in subjects with psoriasis looking for the prevalence of psoriatic arthritis. Subjects will be seen and evaluated by a dermatologist at visit 1 and by a rheumatologist at visit 2. A subset of subjects will then go on to visit 3 for imaging procedures (x-ray, MRI, and ultrasound).
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Psoriatic Arthritis in Adults With Psoriasis: An Estimate From Dermatology Practice
DOC.criteria: Subject is >18 years of age at the time of consent. Subject has a confirmed diagnosis of plaque psoriasis by clinical judgment. Subject is able to read and complete questionnaires. Subjects planning to undergo radiographic evaluation, should not have any contraindications to MRI.
